alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 16 at 1:01PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN ITASCA...CENTRAL AITKIN...SOUTHERN ST. LOUIS AND NORTHWESTERN CARLTON COUNTIES... At 101 PM CST, an area of scattered heavy snow showers were along a line extending from near Wolf Lake, to near Canyon, to 8 miles west of the Mille Lacs Band East Lake Area, and moving southwest at 15 mph. Visibilities will drop quickly to near one quarter of a mile in heavy snow showers. Locations impacted include... Big Sandy Lake, Mille Lacs Lake, Aitkin, Swan River, Floodwood, Cotton, McGregor, Warba, Toivola, Palisade, Brookston, Meadowlands, Tamarack, Wolf Lake, Libby, Boulder Lake, Brimson, Mille Lacs Band East Lake Area, Whiteface Reservoir, and Canyon.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Itasca
